description.narrative: I. Number of men with access to legal aid services II. Number of women with access to legal aid services III. Number of magistrates stagiaires definitively appointed IV. Existence of library at CENFOJ V. Existence of a mechanism of pending cases update VI. Existence of thematic report on compliance of judicial decisions with domestic legislation and international

comment.narrative:
I. 3106 men (figures updated on 31st December 2013) have been assisted with free legal aid in the Capital of Bissau and 3 Regions (Oio, Cacheu and Bafata)
II. 852 women (figures updated on 31st December 2013) have been assisted with free legal aid in the Capital of Bissau and 3 Regions (Oio, Cacheu and Bafata)
III. 13 magistrates stagiaires are not definitively appointed
IV. No library at CENFOJ
V. Lack of updated data on pending cases in the Courts
VI. Lack of mechanism to assess the compliance of judicial decisions with human rights standards

I. 6800 people benefited from free legal aid services in Bissau and regions II. 37 magistrates stagiaires are definitively appointed in Courts of Bissau and Regions III. A data system is established and functioning 1V. 2 Sector level courts in Cacheu and Mansoa Regions constructed and operational

I. Achieved: 8466 people benefited from free legal aid services in Bissau and regions II. Partially Achieved: 14 intern magistrates were definitively appointed in Courts of Bissau and Regions III. Not Achieved: A data system is established and functioning (this expected result has not been achieved) IV. Achieved: The Two courts were constructed, equipped and handed over to the Government. One is already operational

description.narrative: Renforcement des capacités de décideurs politiques et cadres techniques ; Mécanisme de coordination intersectorielle ; Capacités d'OSC renforcées sur la gestion des ressources naturelles ; Plateforme nationale en gestion des ressources naturelles
capital of a political entity

activity-description.narrative: Le pays entire car les décideurs politiques et les cadres au niveau national seront formés. Les cadres de Bafatá, Gabú et Quinara sont ciblés au niveau régional. Les OCB et ONG nationales et régionales seront impliquées. La plupart d'activités se tiendront à Bissau.

description.narrative: Energy - policy, planning and administration

1. Nombre de décideurs politiques (H/F) et de cadres (H/F) ayant des connaissances sur la gestion des ressources naturelles renouvelables et non renouvelables 2. Existence d’un mécanisme de coordination intersectorielle 3. Nombre d’instruments de base qui aident la prise de décision dans la gestion des ressources naturelles. 4. Existence et mise en œuvre d'un programme compréhensif d'information et éducation environnementales 5. Existence de plateforme nationale de la surveillance environnementale

comment.narrative: 1. Faibles connaissances scientifiques, juridiques et commerciales des décideurs politiques et des cadres. 2. Inexistence de mécanisme de coordination intersectorielle. 3. Inexistence d’instruments de base qui aident la prise de décision dans la gestion des ressources naturelles. 4. Inexistence d'un programme compréhensif d'information et éducation environnementales 5. Inexistence de plateforme nationale pour la surveillance environnementale.

1. 36 hommes et 22 femmes 2.. Le mécanisme de coordination pour élaboration de politique nationale est établi 3. 6 règlementations et 8 guides sectoriels d'évaluation d'impact environnemental 4. Un programme radiophonique est établi et diffusé 5. Vingtaine d'ONG et d'OCB qui forment la plateforme sont identifiées.

1. 6 hommes et 1 femme 2. Le mécanisme de coordination pour élaboration de politique nationale est établi. 3. 6 règlementations et 8 guides en cours d'élaboration. 4. Un programme radiophonique n'est pas encore établi. 5. Quarantaine d'ONG et d'OCB qui forment la plateforme sont identifiées.

title.narrative: Local governance and economic development project

description.narrative: The objective of this project is to enhance the capacity of national, regional and pre-municipalities authorities and to reinforce a inclusive and participatory planning in order to improve food security and reduce poverty.

title.narrative: Creating the conditions for local governance and local development in Guinea Bissau
LD Cover Page version 2 General Revision 1

description.narrative: This joint UNDP-UNCDF programme aims to create the conditions for decentralization in Guinea Bissau building on lessons learned from the PADDL project.

1. Existence of the national and regional planning, monitoring and evaluation system 2. Existence of integrated capacity building programme for regional planning, monitoring and evaluation system 3. Number of community consultative bodies established and promoting transparency and accountability in local public affairs 4. Number of people trained in new planning systems in Regional and Sectorial Planning Cabinets 5. Number of Sectorial Development Plans sensitive to gender and climate change developed 6. Number of Regional Development Plans sensitive to gender and climate change developed 7. Existence of Regional and Sectorial micro-financing schemes that enhance the business opportunities 8. Existence of value-chain financing facilities that supports local development

comment.narrative: 1. No regional planning, monitoring and evaluation methodology in place 2. Inexistence of a capacity building programme on regional planning, monitoring and evaluation 3. 0 4. 0 5. 0 6. 0 7. No micro-financing schemes in place 8. Non existence of value-chain financing facilities that supports local development

1. Regional planning, monitoring and evaluations planning methodology evaluated and validated 2. Regional and local planning system in coherence with national sectorial priorities for development was strengthened

title.narrative: Strengthening National PA System in Guinea-Bissau

description.narrative: The project will support the capitalization of biodiversity Trust Fund Bioguine Foundation and IBAP to effectively manage the National Protected Area System, particularly the management of the Castanhez National Park.

A sustainable financial mechanism will be in place supporting the National Protected Area System and IBAP's capacity to effectively manage the Cantanhez National Park will be reinforced through a comprehensive capacity development program implementation.

The project aims at contributing to improving the delivery of justice services through the establishment of a robust information system in the justice sector with full participation of CSO, professional associations and communities.

The project aims at contributing to improving the delivery of justice services through the establishment of a robust information system in the justice sector that will enable an integrated management of backlog cases throughout the justice chain.
